pageContext.claim: “We have also taken bold action to reduce the price of prescription drugs. Happening. Happening. Happening. I called up Pfizer. I called up Novartis, and they were great. They rolled back their prices. That's when I realized how powerful this office is.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. It did not roll back prices.
